title: Jam'yat Luthfullahi Prayers
author: Fadhilat Shaykh Muh. Robiu Adebayo Abdul Malik R.T.A Al-Ilory
name:
Bismillahi Rahaman Raheem
 In The Name of Allah, The Compassionate The Merciful.

content.name:
LAYSA LAHA MIN DUUNIL-LAAHI KAASH I FATUN 
 No one but Allaah can disclose it. (Q 53: 58) 153 Ce.

content.transliteration: LAJAHTU ILAL-MAWLAL-ALI JALLA SHAHNUHU LIDAFUHI WA JALBI QOD KAFANIYA HISINUHU
content.translation: In the Lord the Most High Whose Affairs are Mighty I seek protection and provision. His fortress is sufficient for me.

content.transliteration: YAQEENI YAQEENI SHARRA BAGIN WA MOKIRIN WA SHUGULI JAMOLU-L-HASHIMIYYI WA HUSINUHU
content.translation: I am certain, I am certain That the transgressors the evil planners Shall have no success I am obsessed by the beauty and goodness Of the Hashimte Prophet.

content.transliteration: SARA FI URUQI HUBBUHU WA MODIIHUHU DAWAHI WA IIIDADI LIMO HAMMO HUZINUHU
content.translation: In my neins flows his love, And his eulogy is my preparation For comforting the aggrieved.

content.transliteration: LAHU WA ILAYHI MUSHTAKAYA WA GAYRUHU SARABUN FALA YARWI WAHASBIYA MUZPNUHU
content.translation: To Him I lodge my complain He is the rain And others are mirage: A mirage gives no water. Sufficient for me are His toment rains.

content.transliteration: HADIMTU BIZKRI-L-MUSTOFA MO YARUMUHU HADUWI BIIMIILLAHI MON JALLA SHAHNUHU
content.translation: With the eulogy of Al-Mustapha I have destroyed the plan of my foe. By the permission of Allah -Whose affairs are Mighty I have overcome the foe.

content.transliteration: ARIL-ABUDA YA MAWLAL-BARAYA BISUR'ATIN HALAAKAADUWWIFANNUHULAYSAFANNUHU
content.translation: Show your sevant O Lord of the creation How You have destroyed the foe's plan: Destroy not the foe.

content.transliteration: MAHAL-ILMI ANNI FI JANABIKA QOSIRUN ELAYICA INTISABI WAHUWA GAYRUICA KINNUHU
content.translation: You know how weak I am by Your side Upon You I depend: While the enemy seeks power From Your creatures.

content.transliteration: NAKHAFU WA INNA JARUHU WA ABIDUHU WAMONI KHAZA BIL-MAKHLUQI QOD-TAMMO AMNUHU
content.translation: Panic we are though, We are Allah's sevants and protege Defenceless is he who seek refuge in a creature

content.transliteration: DARAHTU BIHI YA WAYLAHUM FI NUHURIHIM FAHALIK ADUWWAL-LAHI WAL-YAMUHU AENUHU
content.translation: By His Power I send Back to the enemies their curse: Destruction shall be for Allah's foes.

content.transliteration: WAQOFTU BIBABIL-HAQQI JALLA JALALUHU WUQUFA DITRAR1 MON ATAL-KULLAMONNUHU
content.translation: At the doorstep of the Truth, Mighty be His Greatness I stand, in obedience and submission, Seeking His Grace.

content.transliteration: NASORTA UBAYDAN WAQTA DHULLI WA FAQOTIN ALAHEENI LA FIL-L-KHALQI MON BANA AONUHU
content.translation: O Lord! You give succour To thy servant in depression and wretchedness When no one in the world Comes to his aid.

content.transliteration: ADIM KARAMON YA ZAL-ICARIIMI WA ZIDLAHU MONALAMBIHI QOD QORRAFI DAHRI AENUHU
content.translation: O The Noble God Add to his success that which will be The comfort of his eyes.

content.transliteration: LITAKFIL-IDA WALITAKFINI-D-DAHRA SAYIDYYI FA1NNYA ABUDU LLAHI WA-L-KAWNU KAWNUHU
content.translation: O my Lord Be sufficient for me As protection against The foes and odds of time For I am your servants And the entire existence Is Yours.

content.transliteration: LAHU ABADDAN SAYRI WA QOSDI WA WIJHATI WA MO DORRA GAYRUS-SODDI MINIHU WA BAYNUHU
content.translation: For God's sake forever Shall be my movement, intention and focus No avertion but His Can trouble ( mankind ).

content.transliteration: HUWAL-WAAHIDUL-QOHARU HAQON WA AMRUHU HUWAL-AMRU MINIHU-L-ABDU QOD ZAL'A SHAYNUHU
content.translation: He is really Unique, the Subduer His command is the real command. By Him the servant's problem Is solved.

content.transliteration: KASHAFTU BIHI KULLAL-KURUBI WA INNANI WA SOHABI KAFANA HISNUHU THUMMO SOWNUHU
content.translation: By Him My grief is succoured And for me and my companion His Defence and Protection Are Sufficient.

content.transliteration: AJIB YA ILLAHI MON YUJIBU IZADUHI BIKAS-SITRU DAHRAN LIL-UBAYDI WA ZINUHU
content.translation: Answer 0 my Lord! You are the Lord Who answers When He is called. . In You The small servant Does take shelter Every now and again!

content.transliteration: SHAFAHUN LIMO YAI-fRU BIZIKRIKA DAIMON BIZIKRIKA QOLIBAL-ABDI QOD ZAL' A GAYNUHU
content.translation: Cure O Lord The one who remembers You Of his ailments With Your remembrance His worries subside.

content.transliteration: FASOLLI SOLATAN MINKA YA HAYYU SAMIHI ALAL-MUSTOFA MON AENUHUNUNUAENUHU
content.translation: Send Your Blessings 0 the Alive, Who hears me, Upon the chosen Prophet. (7)

content.transliteration: HADAL-KHALQO TURRAN SOLLIYYANNA WA SALLIMON ALAYHI M AHAL-ASIHAIN WA LIYAHLU SHANUHU
content.translation: He, the Noble Apostle, Has guided the entire world. O Lord. Send Blessings and Peace On him and his companions And let his honour To go on thriving.

content.name: INNAA KAFAYNAAKAL MUSTAHZI'EENA For sufficient are We unto You against those who scoff. (Q 15: 95) 177Ce.

content.transliteration: INI' STAJARTUD-DAHRA BIL-MUHAYMINI BIZAL-JAWARI HUZTU KULLA MAHMONI
content.translation: In God, The Protector I seek refuge. With such refuge I have attained security In its entirety.

content.transliteration: NILTULLAZI QOD RUMTU KHUZTUL-AMALA BIL-MUHMINIL-KA I' FI WA JALLA WA HALA
content.translation: With God The Guardian of faith The All-Sufficient So Great and Mighty I have realised my hope.

content.transliteration: NILTULLAZI FATAL-FUHULA TURRAN AQULU DHKA LIL-ILAHI SHUKURAN
content.translation: I have attained What eluded the giants As a whole. I have so voiced To thank the Lord.

content.transliteration: ADIM ILAHI NIHMOTI WAZIDHA WA TAMMIMONIHA ABADAN WA SUNIHA
content.translation: Make my blessings, O Lord, Eternal and many folds And secure them. Again and again.

content.transliteration: KAFAL-ILAHU I'AYDA KULLI KAIDIN WA QOD WAQONA SHARRA KULLI HASIDIN
content.translation: Sufficient is God As over comer of the deceiful He has protected us From mischief of the envious.

content.transliteration: FALALTU SAYFA KULLI SOILLIN ATA MOTA ROJAHATU LIL-ILAHI MUKHBIT A
content.translation: Sword of every fighter I have destroyed When I returned To God As a seeker of (His ) refuge.

content.transliteration: NAUDDUHUM KHAMSAM BAQO ALAYNA YAKIFIHUMUL-MAOLA FAHUM QOLAON A
content.translation: In five clusters* The enemies are grouped To suprisely descend on us As they loathe us God shall conquer them.

content.transliteration: AHALIKHUMU WA' SHDUD ALAYHIM WATIATAK AHZA AZIZ WALTUNILHUM NIKMOTAK
content.translation: The Treacherous The Mischevious The Traitor The Sadist The Conspirator  Destroy them And put to them Difficulty Dole to them Nemesis from You.

content.transliteration: KAFAYTA HULIL-HAZMI KULA BAGIN BIHIMU ILAHI FAKFINI ZAL-BAGI
content.translation: You saved Apostles of resolute From mischief makers In the past: My Lord Protect me from He who aims mischief At me.

content.transliteration: ABAO IQOMOTA LIDINIKAL-QOWIIM 'WA-AKHAZU BISHIRKI ZULMOKAL-HAZIM
content.translation: The deceitful have Rejected Your Right-Guided Religion And have taken The path of infidelity A great sin against You.

content.transliteration: LA TUUTIHIM MOKRAM BUAYDAL-YAOMI WANZIL IQOBAKA BIHAYYIL-QOWMI
content.translation: Give them not The chance to thrive on with deceit Send forth Your penalty On their location.

content.transliteration: MONZILU ZULU GADOBAN WA ADLAN WA ATINA YA ROBBI DAHRAN FADLAN
content.translation: Put them in abode of dishonour To show annoyance and justice And grant us 0 our Lord Favour Every now and again.

content.transliteration: SUHQON LLAHUM DAMMIRHUMU JAMIHAN FAQOD BAGAW JANAABIKAL-MUNIIHAN
content.translation: Away with them Put them all In destruction For they have transgressed Your fortified bound.

content.transliteration: TARUDDU MO'KADU ILA NUHURIIHIM WA KHUZIiiUMU BIZULIMIHIM WA JAORIHIM
content.translation: Return unto them Their guile Seize them with punishment • For their oppressiorf and tyranny.

content.transliteration: HATTIK SUTURAHUM WA DAMMIR MOLAHUM WA MULIKAHUMWANASILAHUM WA MOLAHUM
content.translation: Tear down their subterfuge Put in disarray Their estate, their offspring And all that belong To them.

content.transliteration: ZALZIL UMURAHUM WA FARRIQ SHAMLAHUM .WA ADIKHILIL-BAGDOAH1NABAYNAHUM
content.translation: Shake their affairs And make their congress Disunited Enter into them, hatred At all time.

content.transliteration: AMINU YA ROBBI BIJAIL-MUSTOPHA SOLLA ALAYHI ROBBUNA WA SHARRAFA
content.translation: Answer my call O Lord I besearch You With the htmour Of the chosen Apostle Peace and Blessings of our Lord Be bestowed on him.

content.transliteration: YA. ROBBI Y 'A ROBBI BIJAHIL-HADI AJIB UBAYDAKA MOTTA YUNADI
content.translation: O Lord O Lord Answer Your servant Whenever he calls. I beseech You With the honour Of the Guide (To the right path)

content.transliteration: YASTAHSILUL-JABARU QAOMAN RC:MU BIMONI HUMU LADAYKA DHARA QOMU
content.translation: Uproot, O Almighty Compeller, People who seek Destruction for those Who stand for You At all times.

content.transliteration: NIHMOL-WAKIILU WA HUWA HASBIL-LAHU HASBI LIMO ARJUHU AO AKHSHAHU
content.translation: The Best Disposer of Affair Is sufficient for me In all that I Want Or fear.

content.name:
YUQRA'U FI KULLI AKHIRID-DUHAI 
 AT THE END OF EVERY DU'A (3/7Ce).

content.transliteration: YAH MAN IDHA DOQOL- FADO WATARAKAMOT JUMALU DAWAH
content.translation: I call Upon You 0 Lord, You provide relief With Your favour

content.transliteration: FARRAJITAHA BIDAQIQOTIN MINI HUSINI LUTIFIKA YAH-ILAHI
content.translation: When the moment is tense And when calamity moves To its height.

content.name:
DU'A'UL-ISTIGAATHA. 
 DU'A FOR FAVOUR YAA LATEEF - (1,129)

content.transliteration: YAH- LATIFAS-SUNIHI YAH-MAN KULLAMA DAHAMAL-AMURU JALLA MA DAHAMON
content.translation: O The Most Graceful In (His) deads 0 Lord Who correct situations When they go berserk

content.transliteration: YAH- GIYATHAL- MUSTAGITHINA WA YA MON MODOL — HUKIMU IDHA MA HAKAMON.
content.translation: O the Giver of succour To the be wildered I beseech You Whose decision holds.

content.transliteration: NAFFISIL — AMRA ALAYNA SURIATAN INNAMAL — AMURU ALAYNA AZ.OMON
content.translation: Relieve us Of our predicament In time For it has become unbearable.

content.transliteration: WAS — TAJIB MINNA DUHA'HAN KARAMON YAH- KARIMU ANTA ROBBUL- KURAMO
content.translation: Answer our prayer In honour O the Generous One You are the Lord Of the Noble servants.

content.name: LI-GALABA'TIL-ADUWINI WAIHLAAKIHIM. AHAMU SAQOKU HALAU YASU - (111)

content.transliteration: AUDHU BILLAHI MINI UMUYYIN WAMIN SOMOMIN WAMIN JUZAMIN WABARSIN HAKADH A SHALALIN
content.translation: I seek refuge In God From blindness, deafness Leprosy and paralysis.

content.transliteration: HABLI BANINAM BANATIN ANTA DHUKARAMIN WAZID SALAMATA FI JISMI BILA MALALIN
content.translation: Give me Sons and daughters You are the Giver of Generousity Give more peace To me Without weariness.

content.transliteration: MAQQIT IDAN BIJUIN ANTA MUNTAQIMUN WABIS- SUDAHI WADAUHIN THUMMA BIDDUMALI
content.translation: Afflict our foes With hunger, headache and pustule You are the Avenger.

content.transliteration: SALLIM ABEEDAKA MIN JUIN WAMIN SAQOMN WAMIN JUNUUNI WADASIN HAICAZA FASHALIN
content.translation: Save Your little servant From hunger, ailments, madness, failure And from being trampled upon.

content.transliteration: QOHIR HUSADALANA WAQ,HIDIHUMBIL-WARA1V11 ICHAWWIF'HUMYAH-ROBBANANAQQ1S1HUMBIL-I'LALI
content.translation: Conquer the envious Sit them down. With swelling Cause fear in them 0 our Lord Reduce them with ailments.

content.transliteration: KUN LI WALIYAN NASIRAN ANTA HAFIZUNA WAHSIN !WAWA TIMANA MANNA WABIL-FADILI
content.translation: Be for me A friend and Helper You are our Protector Give us good end.. As blessing and favour.

content.transliteration: HAYYUN Q0YYUMUN FAHAYYI KULLA HARAKATINA gAZAKA AR' WAHINA BIL-ILMI WAL-AMALI
content.translation: O The Alive, The Self-Subsisting Breath life into our action And into our soul So we can practice What we learn.

content.transliteration: LAYSA SHABIHU LIROBBIL-KHALIQI ZU ABADIN WA-ANTA MALIJAUNA QOSDAN WAFIL- AMALI
content.translation: There is no like Unto the Creator of tile world He is Everlasting Cr Lord You are our refuge In purpose and hope.

content.transliteration: ALAYKA TUKLANU FIS-SIRRI WAFIL-ALANI WAFIS —SARRAI WAD-DORRAI WAFT WAJALIN
content.translation: Upon You we depend In secret and open Whether at peace or in troubles.

content.transliteration: YAHL-LAHU YAHL-LAIRJ YAH-ALLAHU YAH-ICHALIQI DOMMIN RIDOICALANA MONNA BILA ICHALALIN.
content.translation: O ALLAH! 0 ALLAH!! 0 ALLAH!!! 0 my Creator Grant us Your Pleesure Devoid of defect.

content.transliteration: SOLLI WASALLIM ALA KHAYRIL-BARIYYATI YAH MONI HUWA RAHMATUL-UZMAN BIZAL-ADILI
content.translation: Send Your Blessings and Peace On the best of mankind I beseech You Who own the greatest of blessings.

content.name:
DU'AU MUBAARKUN LITAFRIJI HAMMIN WAL-GAMMIN. 
 DU'A FOR RELIEF FROM GREF AND SORROW.

content.transliteration: YAH-MON YARA MAFI DOMIRI WA YASIMAUN ANTAL-MUADDU LIKULLI MAN YUTAWAQOUN
content.translation: O Lord Who sees and hears my conscience You are ready For all expectation

content.transliteration: YAH-MON YUROJJA LISHADAIDI KULLIHA YAH-MONI ILAYHIL-MUSHTAKA WAL-MUFZAUN
content.translation: O Lord I whom lie all hope against all odds O Lord In whom the troubled and the fri-ghtered Seek refuge.

content.transliteration: YAH-MONI KHAZAINU RIZIQIHI Fl QAWLI KUN UMUNUN FAINNAL-KHAYRA INDAKA AJIMAUN
content.translation: O Lord Whose provision stores Are enclaved in the word: 'BE' All forums belong to You.

content.transliteration: MALI SIWA FAQRI ILAYKA WASILATUN FABILIFTIQORI ILAYKA FAQRIYA ADIFAUN
content.translation: I have But poverty as means Of reading You By imploring You for help My poverty is nip in bud.

content.transliteration: MALI SIWA QORIHIN LIBABIKA HILATUN FALAIN RUDIDTU FA-AYYABABINI AQRAUN
content.translation: I have But 'knocking' on YOU,' door As trick If I am rejected Whose door then should I knock at .

content.transliteration: MAN ZALLADHI ADIUN WA-AHTIFU BISIMIHI IN KA- NA FADILUKA AN FAQIRIKA YUMUNAUN
content.translation: Whose name Should I call If Your fortune Is put away From Your poor servant.

content.transliteration: HASAH LIJUDIKA AN TUQONNITO ASIYAN AL-FADILU AJIZALU WAL-MAWAHIBU AOSAUN
content.translation: How perfect Is Your Generosity That You did not Shatter the sinner's hope (Your) fortune is well enriching And (Your) Gifts are too exhorbitant.

content.transliteration: WABI DHULLI QOD WAFAYTU BABAKA ALIMAN ANNA TADHALLULA INDA BABAKA YANFAUN
content.translation: With humility I feel my presence At Your door Knowing that humility At Your door benefits.

content.transliteration: WAJA'ALTU MU'TAMIDINI ALAYKA TAWAKKULAN WABASASTU KAFFIYA SAILANI ATADORAUN
content.translation: I rely wholly on you And stretch my palms Asking and imploring (Your Blessings).

content.transliteration: FABIHAQQI MONI AHBABTAHU WABAHATH-TAHU WA-AJABTA DA'WATA MON BIHI YUTASHAFAUN
content.translation: I beseech You With whom You Loved And sent (to the world). For You (indeed) ) love the call Of the intercessor.

content.transliteration: IJIAL-LANA MIN KULLI DIQIN MMAKHRAJAN WAL-TUF BINA YA MAN ILAYKAL-MARIAUN
content.translation: Show us A way out of depression And be graceful to us O Lord To whom every thing Shall return.

content.transliteration: THUMMOS-SOLATU ALAN-NABIYYI WA-AHLIHI KHAYRIL-ANAMI WAMAN BIHI YUTASHAFAUN
content.translation: Blessing of ALLAH. Be upon the (Noble) Prophet. And His households He is the best Of mankind And the intercessor.

content.transliteration: SALAMUNI ALAYKUM HALATAL-QURIBI WAL-BU'DI SALAMUM BIHI TAZDAADU ROBITOTAL-WUDDI
content.translation: Peace be on You. Whether at far Or at close With peece tie of love Is fastened

content.transliteration: SALAMUN BIHI TAHYAN-NUFUSU WAYANJALI BIHI KULLU KARIBIN MAH SALAMIN BILA HADDIN
content.translation: With Peace Souls Continue to live And grief gets relieved To unlimited extent

content.transliteration: SALAMUMRI-IN LAM TABUQO MINIHU BAQIYYATIN. SIWA NOZORIL-AE NAY NI AO SHAHWATAL-QOLBI
content.translation: Peace be on The leader of the time The Grand khalifah Awwal O our Lord Give him more protection.
